```{r}
#Compute stats for all patch combinations 
ID_combinations_w_combination_sets =  all_sets_SL_isolated %>%
  filter(disturbance == disturbance_global_input)

n_combination_sets = ID_combinations_w_combination_sets %>%
  filter(metaecosystem_type %in% metaecosystem_type_input_model,
         connection == "isolated") %>%
  pull(combination_set) %>%
  max()

for (combination_set_input in 1:n_combination_sets) {
  
  system_nr_isolated_systems = ID_combinations_w_combination_sets %>%
    filter(
      metaecosystem_type %in% metaecosystem_type_input_model,
      connection == "isolated",
      combination_set == combination_set_input
    ) %>%
    pull(system_nr)
  
  filtered_data = ds_metaecosystems %>%
    filter(
      time_point >= first_time_point_model,
      time_point <= last_time_point_model,
      metaecosystem_type %in% metaecosystem_type_input_model,
      connection == "connected" |
        (connection == "isolated" &
           system_nr %in% system_nr_isolated_systems)
    )
  
  null_model = lmer(
    get(response_variable) ~
      day +
      (day | system_nr),
    data = filtered_data,
    REML = FALSE,
    control = lmerControl(optimizer = "Nelder_Mead")
  )
  
  full_model = lmer(
    get(response_variable) ~
      day +
      connection +
      connection:day +
      (day | system_nr),
    data = filtered_data,
    REML = FALSE,
    control = lmerControl(optimizer = "Nelder_Mead")
  )
  
  model_stats_full = compute.model.stats(full_model,
                                         null_model,
                                         "mixed_model")
  
  interaction_model = lmer(
    get(response_variable) ~
      day +
      connection:day +
      (day | system_nr),
    data = filtered_data,
    REML = FALSE,
    control = lmerControl(optimizer = "Nelder_Mead")
  )
  
  model_stats_interaction = compute.model.stats(interaction_model,
                                                null_model,
                                                "mixed_model")
  
  fixed_model = lmer(
    get(response_variable) ~
      day +
      connection +
      (day | system_nr),
    data = filtered_data,
    REML = FALSE,
    control = lmerControl(optimizer = "Nelder_Mead")
  )
  
  model_stats_fixed = compute.model.stats(fixed_model,
                                          null_model,
                                          "mixed_model")
  
  iterated_results_table = fill.results.table(
    iterated_results_table,
    response_variable,
    metaecosystem_type_input_model,
    model_stats_full,
    model_stats_interaction,
    model_stats_fixed
  )
  
  iterated_results_table$combination_set = combination_set_input
}
```
